mapper.sql: m.MARGIN_LIST_ID, m.CHASH_ID, m.MERCHANT_ID, m.MORTGAGE_AMT, m.RECHARGE_AMT, m.MORTGAGE_FLG, m.GET_QUOTA, m.ADD_MORTGAGE_AMT, m.RECHARGE_FACE_AMT, m.ADD_GET_QUOTA, m.APPROVE_STAT, m.APPLY_USER_ID, m.APPLY_USER_NAME, m.APPLY_TIME, m.APPROVE_ID, m.APPROVE_NAME, m.APPROVE_TIME, m.CONFIRM_PAYMENT_ID, m.CONFIRM_PAYMENT_NAME, m.CONFIRM_PAYMENT_TIME, m.DATA_STAT, m.REMARKS, m.CREATE_USER, m.UPDATE_USER, m.CREATE_TIME, m.UPDATE_TIME, m.LOCK_VERSION
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_MERCHANT_MARGIN_LIST m WHERE m.MARGIN_LIST_ID = #{marginListId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MERCHANT_MARGIN_LIST ( MARGIN_LIST_ID, CHASH_ID, MERCHANT_ID, MORTGAGE_AMT, GET_QUOTA, RECHARGE_AMT, MORTGAGE_FLG, ADD_MORTGAGE_AMT, RECHARGE_FACE_AMT, ADD_GET_QUOTA, APPROVE_STAT, APPLY_USER_ID, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_TIME, APPROVE_ID, APPROVE_NAME, APPROVE_TIME, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{marginListId}, #{chashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addMortgageAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeFaceAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addGetQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MERCHANT_MARGIN_LIST SET MORTGAGE_AMT=#{mortgageAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MORTGAGE_FLG=#{mortgageFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_MORTGAGE_AMT=#{addMortgageAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHARGE_AMT=#{rechargeAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECHARGE_FACE_AMT=#{rechargeFaceAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GET_QUOTA=#{getQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_GET_QUOTA=#{addGetQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_STAT=#{approveStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_USER_ID=#{applyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_USER_NAME=#{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_TIME=#{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_ID=#{approveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_NAME=#{approveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_TIME=#{approveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRM_PAYMENT_ID=#{confirmPaymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRM_PAYMENT_NAME=#{confirmPaymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRM_PAYMENT_TIME=#{confirmPaymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STAT=#{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, LOCK_VERSION=LOCK_VERSION+1 WHERE MARGIN_LIST_ID = #{marginListId}
